NK004(nga)004:0: gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo snga 'gyur bi ma'i lugs
NK004(nga)004:1: kyi rig pa gtad pa'i cho ga yon tan bcud
NK004(nga)004:2: skyed ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK004(nga)004:3: na mo gu ru si t+aa t+aa pa tre b+h+yah mtshan mchog mthar thug gtsug tor las //
NK004(nga)004:5: rig pa'i rgyal mor gus btud nas //
NK004(nga)004:6: rig pa gtod pa'i lag len dgod //
NK004(nga)004:7: gtsug tor rgyal mo'i rig pa gtad pas slob ma rjes su 'dzin pa la /
NK004(nga)004:8: rgyas par dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba gzhung bzhin 'grub
NK004(nga)004:9: na mchog yin kyang mi 'grub pas dkyus 'gre tsam
NK004(nga)004:14: dang po ni stegs gtsang ma'i steng du ras bris
NK004(nga)004:15: kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung mthun bris pa bkram pa'i dbus
NK004(nga)004:16: su many+dzi'i khar bum pa dri bzang gi chab dang
NK004(nga)004:17: bya rgyud bum rdzas bco lngas bkang ba /
NK004(nga)004:19: 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa bzhag /
NK004(nga)004:20: gtsug tor dang phur pa rnams ni skabs 'dir ras bris la bris pas 'thus par byed /
NK004(nga)004:21: las bum bcud ldan mgul chings ljang gu can byang shar dang /
NK004(nga)004:22: 'khor lo yod na dbus su bkod /
NK004(nga)004:25: mdun du dkyil 'khor pa'i mchod gtor dkar zlum /
NK004(nga)004:26: g.yas su legs ldan mched gsum la dkar gtor sum bsgrigs /
NK004(nga)004:27: g.yon du 'byung po dang yi dwags rnams la zlum gtor changs bu bcas bkod do //
NK004(nga)004:28: gnyis pa dngos gzhi'i thog mar sngon 'gro dkar gtor spyi 'tshams bzhin btang /
NK004(nga)004:29: sangs rgyas chos tshogs lan gsum gyis skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya /
NK004(nga)004:30: sems can thams cad bde ba dang sogs brjod la tshad med bzhi bsgom /
NK004(nga)004:31: skad cig gis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po'i skur gyur /
NK004(nga)004:32: ces gsal gdab la nga rgyal bzung /
NK004(nga)004:33: bgegs gtor 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bsang /
NK004(nga)004:35: stong pa'i ngang las rin po che'i snod du gtor
NK004(nga)004:36: ma kha dog dri ro nus pa phun sum tshogs
NK004(nga)004:39: sarba b+h+au ta +aa kar+sha ya dzah zhes mgron 'gugs /
NK004(nga)004:40: sarba big+h+n+aana na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi
NK004(nga)004:41: shwa mu khe b+h+yahsarba th+aa kham ung+ga te s+pha ra
NK004(nga)004:42: na i mam ga ga na kham grih+nee dam ba
NK004(nga)004:43: lim ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK004(nga)004:45: bdag cag dpon slob yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa
NK004(nga)004:46: rnams la sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan
NK004(nga)004:47: pa rnams dang / sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
NK004(nga)004:48: drag shul dang drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
NK004(nga)004:49: gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang /
NK004(nga)004:50: gzi brjid 'phrog pa'i gdon thams cad la spos dang
NK004(nga)004:51: me tog dang bdug pa dang gtor ma yang sbyin
NK004(nga)004:52: no // gtor ma dang mchod pa 'dis mgu bar
NK004(nga)004:53: gyis la sa 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs
NK004(nga)004:54: no // shig / badz+ra p+aa ni b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha badz+ra
NK004(nga)004:55: p+aa sha ma ma sarba dush+tam big+h+n+aana bi na ya
NK004(nga)004:56: ka h'u h'u phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK004(nga)004:57: zhes dang 'khyil ba'i sngags brjod la bskrad /
NK004(nga)004:58: sh+tmo b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha badz+ra ma ma rak+sha rak+sha badz+ra p+aa ni h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK004(nga)004:59: zhes pas mtshams bcad la bsrung /
NK004(nga)004:60: de nas cho ga gzhung ltar /
NK004(nga)004:61: rang gi snying gar yi ge a gnas pa sogs nas phyag 'tshal rnams brjod /
NK004(nga)004:62: ji snyed su dag sogs kyis yan lag bdun pa 'bul /
NK004(nga)004:63: phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
NK004(nga)004:64: byin rlabs bdag la bsdus pa las //
NK004(nga)004:65: sogs kyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag bdun dbyer med du bskyed /
NK004(nga)004:68: sgo srung khor yug bskyed pa'i bar song nas rang
NK004(nga)004:69: nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su gtso bo'i rnam
NK004(nga)004:70: par zur du phye nas 'khod pas /
NK004(nga)004:71: las kyi rim pa rnams byed par mos la /
NK004(nga)004:72: ye shes pa spyan drangs shing bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal rnams bya /
NK004(nga)004:73: bsang chu snying po'i sngags lan bdun gyis brlabs pa mchod rdzas la 'thor /
NK004(nga)004:74: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin
NK004(nga)004:75: gyis brlabs pa'i stobs dang bdag gi bsod nams dang
NK004(nga)004:76: smon lam gyi stobs dang rig sngags kyi stobs kyis
NK004(nga)004:77: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
NK004(nga)004:78: 'khor rnams la mchog tu rgya chen po byang chub
NK004(nga)004:79: sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las mngon
NK004(nga)004:80: par mtho ba'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po rab tu
NK004(nga)004:83: na mahsarba bud+d+h+aa bo d+hi sa t+wa n+aam /
NK004(nga)004:84: sarba th+aa kha ung+ga te s+pha ra na mam ga ga na kham sa man+ta s+w+aa h+aa /
NK004(nga)004:85: zhes pa'i sngags lan brgyad bzlas pas mchod rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs nas chu bzhi'i sngags dang /
NK004(nga)004:86: 'jig rten khams ni sogs kyis nyer spyod 'bul /
NK004(nga)004:89: rdzas brgyad rnams mdor bsdus pa ni /
NK004(nga)004:90: mdzes sdug yid 'ong gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra //
NK004(nga)004:91: bsil byed tsan+dana dri dang ro brgya'i zas //
NK004(nga)004:92: mnyen 'khril pany+tsa li ka reg na bde //
NK004(nga)004:93: 'dod yon rnam lnga rgyal ba sras bcas la //
NK004(nga)004:94: 'bul gyis bzhes nas dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK004(nga)004:95: sarba ta th+aa ga ta pany+tsa ka ma gu na p+au dzi te +aahmh'u /
NK004(nga)004:96: mi dbang rin chen sna bdun 'di dag gis //
NK004(nga)004:97: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus pa //
NK004(nga)004:98: bsam zhing yid kyis sprul te 'bul lags na //
NK004(nga)004:99: 'gro ba mi zad gter la longs spyod shog /
NK004(nga)004:100: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sap+ta ran+ta badz+ra p+au dzi te +aahmh'u /
NK004(nga)004:101: lha yi dbang po lha min g.yul rgyal nas //
NK004(nga)004:102: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa ltar //
NK004(nga)004:103: rgyal ba rnams dang gdugs dkar lha tshogs la //
NK004(nga)004:104: bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyi //
NK004(nga)004:105: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ash+ta mang+ga lam dra be badz+ra p+au dzi te +aahmh'u /
NK004(nga)004:107: dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang po che //
NK004(nga)004:109: gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba la b+h+r+au yig gi
NK004(nga)004:110: mthar sngags phreng gis bskor ba'i 'od zer spro bsdus
NK004(nga)004:111: don gnyis bsgrub par bsam la /
NK004(nga)004:113: a na le sogs bsnyen sngags ci nus dang /
NK004(nga)004:114: 'khor gyi srung sngags rnams kyang tshar ci rigs bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK004(nga)004:118: de nas bum pa sgrub pa ni /
NK004(nga)004:121: stong pa'i ngang las pad zla'i steng //
NK004(nga)004:122: bum pa b+h+r+au las gzhal yas khang //
NK004(nga)004:123: mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
NK004(nga)004:124: dbus su pad+ma nyi zla'i steng //
NK004(nga)004:125: b+h+r+au las gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo //
NK004(nga)004:126: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhi ba'i tshul //
NK004(nga)004:127: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
NK004(nga)004:128: dang po phreng ba rgyal mtshan dang //
NK004(nga)004:129: 'og ma skyabs sbyin mnyam gzhag can //
NK004(nga)004:131: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi ru //
NK004(nga)004:134: rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyi //
NK004(nga)004:136: gsang bar h+aa ljang pad+mara gnas //
NK004(nga)004:138: rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs gyur //
NK004(nga)004:140: / phyogs bcu rab 'byams sogs spyan 'dren dang bzhugs gsol bya /
NK004(nga)004:144: karma a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah zhes pa'i bar gyi dbang bskur rgyas gdab /
NK004(nga)004:145: srid gsum ston pa sogs phyag dang mchod pa tshang ba phul /
NK004(nga)004:147: rgyal ba'i thugs las rab 'phrul zhing //
NK004(nga)004:148: cod pan rab mdzes zhi ba'i tshul //
NK004(nga)004:149: ku mud zla bzang lta bur mdzes //
NK004(nga)004:150: gdugs dkar khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK004(nga)004:151: rin chen chu skyes bum 'khrungs pas //
NK004(nga)004:152: rgyan ldan tshad med rnam bzhi'i phyag /
NK004(nga)004:153: phreng ba rgyal mtshan skyabs sbyin dang //
NK004(nga)004:154: mnyam gzhag phyag mnga' khyod la bstod //
NK004(nga)004:156: / dus gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku //
NK004(nga)004:158: mchod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK004(nga)004:160: rang gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'od zer gzungs thag la 'khril te song /
NK004(nga)004:161: bum pa'i lha rnams kyi thugs rgyud bskul bas sku'i
NK004(nga)004:162: cha thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs bum pa
NK004(nga)004:163: gang bar gyur / ces dmigs la bsnyen sngags brgya rtsa dang /
NK004(nga)004:165: a na le a na le /
NK004(nga)004:166: kha sa me kha sa me /
NK004(nga)004:167: sogs kyang tshar ci rigs bzla /
NK004(nga)004:168: las bum gyi nang du pad zla'i steng du h'u
NK004(nga)004:169: dang sna tshogs rdo rje las bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
NK004(nga)004:170: ljang sngon zhi ma khro'i rnam pa can phyag ga
NK004(nga)004:171: yas sna tshogs rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin cing ga
NK004(nga)004:172: yon des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu dkur brten
NK004(nga)004:173: pa / rin po che'i rgyan dang dar gyi na bza' can /
NK004(nga)004:174: zhabs sems skyil gyis bzhugs pa'i gnas gsum 'bru gsum
NK004(nga)004:175: las 'od 'phros ye shes pa badz+ra sa m+aa dzah
NK004(nga)004:176: dzahmh'u bam hoh slar yang dbang lha spyan drangs pa
NK004(nga)004:177: rnams kyis dbang bskur sku gang dri ma dag /
NK004(nga)004:178: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan par gyur /
NK004(nga)004:179: nyer spyod sngags tsam gyis mchod /
NK004(nga)004:181: 'jigs pa'i h'u sgra sogs kyis bstod /
NK004(nga)004:182: thugs ka nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun bab pas bum pa gang bar mos la /
NK004(nga)004:183: badz+re a mri ta kun+da l+ai ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK004(nga)004:189: zhes dung chus mchod yon phul /
NK004(nga)004:190: badz+ra muh ye shes pa gshegs /
NK004(nga)004:191: dam tshig pa zhu ba las rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun du gyur /
NK004(nga)004:192: de nas dkyil 'khor pa la gtor ma 'bul ba ni /
NK004(nga)004:193: gtor 'bul thams cad sngags rgya drug gis lhan cig tu byin gyis brlab /
NK004(nga)004:195: gtor ma'i steng du a las zla dkyil dbus //
NK004(nga)004:196: h'u las 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs 'phros pas //
NK004(nga)004:197: gtor mar thim pas gtor ma ye shes kyi //
NK004(nga)004:198: bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zad mi shes par gyur //
NK004(nga)004:201: lan gsum brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK004(nga)004:203: i dam ba lim ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK004(nga)004:205: bcom ldan rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa yi //
NK004(nga)004:207: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas legs
NK004(nga)004:208: ldan mched gsum spyan drangs badz+ra sa m+aa dzah ma
NK004(nga)004:209: h+aa k+aa la sha ri b+h+yo /
NK004(nga)004:210: ma h+aa k+aa la dush+tana b+h+yo /
NK004(nga)004:211: ma h+aa k+aa la dush+tana b+h+yo /
NK004(nga)004:212: i dam ba lim ta sogs btags pa lan gsum gyis phul /
NK004(nga)004:214: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK004(nga)004:216: 'byung po dang bgegs kyi gtor ma nus na cha gsum so sor btang /
NK004(nga)004:217: mi lcogs na gong gsal sngon 'gro'i skabs su bshad
NK004(nga)004:218: pa des lhan cig tu sbyin la skrad cing mtshams
NK004(nga)004:219: bcad do // de nas rig pa gtad pa'i cho ga ni /
NK004(nga)004:220: slob ma rnams la las bum gyi chus khrus byas nas gral du 'khod pa la /
NK004(nga)004:221: sems bskyed dang chos bshad mdor bsdus kyis mtshams sbyar nas /
NK004(nga)004:222: 'dir rdo rje theg pa'i bya ba'i rgyud 'jig rten
NK004(nga)004:223: las 'das pa rigs gsum gyi nang tshan de bzhin
NK004(nga)004:224: gshegs pa'i rigs la nang gses dbye ba brgyad du
NK004(nga)004:225: bzhugs pa las gshegs rigs kyi gtsug tor gdugs dkar
NK004(nga)004:227: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi 'od zer
NK004(nga)004:228: las srid pa gsum gyi ma mgon 'byung po dregs
NK004(nga)004:229: pa can thams cad 'dul ba'i gnyen por ched du
NK004(nga)004:230: sprul pa / gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags
NK004(nga)004:231: kyi rgyal mo chen mo zhes basngagasa pa don dang
NK004(nga)004:232: ldan pa 'di la gsol ba btab na gnas skabs
NK004(nga)004:233: nad gdon bar chad byad phur rbod gtong gang gis
NK004(nga)004:234: kyang mi tshugs shing ji ltar bsam pa'i don mtha'
NK004(nga)004:236: tshe 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur
NK004(nga)004:237: ba sogs phan yon mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa
NK004(nga)004:238: 'di nyid 'phags pa'i yul du bka' srol 'ga' zhig
NK004(nga)004:239: byon pa las / 'di ni bstan pa snga dar
NK004(nga)004:240: gyi skabs su 'ja' lus 'pho ba chen po'i sku
NK004(nga)004:241: brnyes pa'i slob dpon bi ma la mi tras spel
NK004(nga)004:248: gnyags chen dz+ny+aa na dang rma rin chen mchog sogs nas brgyud pa bar ma chad par byon cing /
NK004(nga)004:249: phyis su rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa rang byung
NK004(nga)004:250: rdo rjes brgyud pa'i gsung rgyun las 'byung ba nyid
NK004(nga)004:251: gsal byed kyi yig cha mdzad pa la brten nas
NK004(nga)004:252: da lta'i bar du rgyun srol bzhugs pa gtsug tor
NK004(nga)004:253: gdugs dkar mo can gyi rig pa gtad pa bgyi
NK004(nga)004:254: ba la sogs kyis mtshams sbyar nas man+dala 'bul du
NK004(nga)004:255: gzhug / thog mar mdun gyi nam mkhar bla ma
NK004(nga)004:256: rgyal ba sras dang bka' sdod bcas pa mngon sum
NK004(nga)004:257: bzhin du bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sgo gsum gus pa
NK004(nga)004:258: chen pos phyag 'tshal bar mos la 'di'i rjes zlos
NK004(nga)004:259: gzhug / mdzod / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK004(nga)004:260: sogs cho ga'i dbu nas 'byung ba ltar tshar gcig rjes zlos byar gzhug /
NK004(nga)004:261: zhing mchog de dag rnams kyi spyan sngar tshogs bsags cing sdig sgrib sbyong ba dang /
NK004(nga)004:262: dge rtsa byang chub chen po'i rgyur spel ba'i 'dun
NK004(nga)004:263: dmigs rtse gcig pas yan lag bdun pa'i rjes zlos
NK004(nga)004:264: mdzod / ji snyed su dag sogs tshar gcig dang /
NK004(nga)004:265: phyag 'tshal ba sogs lan gsum brjod du gzhug /
NK004(nga)004:266: de nas thal mo me tog dang bcas te gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos /
NK004(nga)004:267: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas
NK004(nga)004:268: byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyis mi thub pa
NK004(nga)004:270: dus thams cad du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK004(nga)004:272: de ltar gsol ba btab pas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso
NK004(nga)004:273: mos rin po che'i bum pas dbang bskur bas bum
NK004(nga)004:274: pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams dngos
NK004(nga)004:275: su gsal ba'i sku las ye shes kyi chu rgyun
NK004(nga)004:276: babs / khyed rang rnams kyi lus gang bas sdig sgrib thams cad dag /
NK004(nga)004:277: lus kyi nang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis gang bar gyur par mos shig /
NK004(nga)004:279: dus gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku //
NK004(nga)004:280: gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che //
NK004(nga)004:281: gtum ma chen mo stobs chen mo //
NK004(nga)004:282: 'bar ma chen mo gzi brjid che //
NK004(nga)004:283: dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo //
NK004(nga)004:284: 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo //
NK004(nga)004:285: 'phags pa sgrol ma khro gnyer can //
NK004(nga)004:286: rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags //
NK004(nga)004:287: pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan //
NK004(nga)004:288: gzhan gyis mi thub phreng shugs can //
NK004(nga)004:290: drag po'i lha rnams phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK004(nga)004:291: zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa //
NK004(nga)004:292: gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can //
NK004(nga)004:293: 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo //
NK004(nga)004:294: rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang //
NK004(nga)004:295: rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma //
NK004(nga)004:296: lag na rdo rje ring bsrel phreng //
NK004(nga)004:297: le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma //
NK004(nga)004:298: snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags //
NK004(nga)004:299: rnam par bsgyings ma rdo rje dang //
NK004(nga)004:300: gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma //
NK004(nga)004:301: rdo rje'i 'gros dang dkar mo dang //
NK004(nga)004:303: phyag rgya'i tshogs de thams cad kyis //
NK004(nga)004:304: 'dir ni dbang bskur mdzad du gsol //
NK004(nga)004:309: h'u ma ma h'u ni s+w+aa h+aa'i mthar /
NK004(nga)004:314: pad+ma a b+hi shiny+tsa h+r+aih karma a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah zhes btags pa brjod la gtso mo dang /
NK004(nga)004:316: sarba ta th+aa ga ta nas /
NK004(nga)004:317: si ta ta pa tre h'u phata /
NK004(nga)004:318: bar brjod la 'khor rnams kyis dbang bskur /
NK004(nga)004:319: bum pa mgor bzhag bum chu 'thor /
NK004(nga)004:320: de nas sngags bzlas pa'i rjes gnang gi ched du
NK004(nga)004:321: slob dpon la mos gus byas pas slob dpon dang
NK004(nga)004:322: mdun bskyed kyi gtso bo dbyer ma mchis pa'i thugs
NK004(nga)004:323: ka nas sngags phreng 'phros zhal nas byung /
NK004(nga)004:324: khyed rang rnams kyis mgrin par zhugs pa'i mos pas rjes zlos /
NK004(nga)004:326: 'khor rigs lnga'i rnams kyis rjees zlos lan gsum byar gzhug /
NK004(nga)004:327: mthar phreng ba'am me tog mgor bzhag la /
NK004(nga)004:328: rdo rje slob ma 'di rnams kyi rgyud la bcom
NK004(nga)004:329: ldan 'das ma gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo'i gsung rig
NK004(nga)004:330: sngags kyi nus mthu ma lus pa 'jug cing brtan
NK004(nga)004:331: par gyur cig / de nas 'khor lo yod na mgor bzhag la 'dogs pa dang /
NK004(nga)004:332: med na bum chu dang me tog 'thor zhing /
NK004(nga)004:333: ri shi ga na sogs srung sngags kyi mthar /
NK004(nga)004:334: bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
NK004(nga)004:335: nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi
NK004(nga)004:336: thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo sogs nas /
NK004(nga)004:337: bdag ces pa 'di zhes kha bsgyur la /
NK004(nga)004:338: phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'di rnams la bsrung du gsol //
NK004(nga)004:340: spro na mtha' rten bya rgyud kyi lugs ltar bkra shis rtags brgyad sbyin /
NK004(nga)004:342: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba sogs shing brjod bya /
NK004(nga)004:343: de ltar chu'i dbang mtha' rten dang bcas bskur bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig sgrib dag /
NK004(nga)004:344: mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa la dbang /
NK004(nga)004:345: 'bras bu sku gnyis mngon du 'grub pa'i skal ba can du byas pa yin no //
NK004(nga)004:346: des bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo'i rig pa gtad
NK004(nga)004:347: pa legs bar grub pa yin pas sogs kyis mtshams
NK004(nga)004:348: sbyar la dam tshig khas len /
NK004(nga)004:351: dge bsngo rnams spyi ltar byas pas grub bo //
NK004(nga)004:352: gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba la mchod pa kha gsos la byin brlab sngags tsam gyis mchod /
NK004(nga)004:353: bstod pa mdor bsdus dang 'dod don zhu ba spyi ltar bya /
NK004(nga)004:354: ma 'byor pa dang sogs dang yi ge brgya pas nyams chag bshags //
NK004(nga)004:355: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
NK004(nga)004:356: sogs kyis ye shes pa gshegs /
NK004(nga)004:358: dam tshig pa rang la thim pa gyur /
NK004(nga)004:359: rang nyid phyag gnyis pa'i nga rgyal dang gnas gsum 'bru gsum gyis bsrung /
NK004(nga)004:360: dge bsngo shis brjod byas pas grub bo //
NK004(nga)004:361: 'di 'bras dge bas gnyis su mi gsungs pas //
NK004(nga)004:362: gsungs pa'i phan yon bdud rtsi'i bcud mchog gis //
NK004(nga)004:363: bdag rgyud gser gyi bum bzang yongs gtams nas //
NK004(nga)004:364: 'gro kun thar pa'i srog zungs 'dzin par shog /
NK004(nga)004:365: ces 'di nyid kyi chog gzhung gi cha lag med
NK004(nga)004:366: ka med du gyur pas blo gros mtha' yas pa'i
NK004(nga)004:367: sdes ts+aa 'dra rin chen brag gi sgrub gnas su
